definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away

sentences.english: And if a woman shall put away her husband, and be married to another, she committeth adultery.
sentences.chinese: 妻子若離棄丈夫另嫁，也是犯奸淫了。

sentences.english: My son, hear the instruction of thy father, and forsake not the law of thy mother
sentences.chinese: 我兒，要聽你父親的訓誨，不可離棄你母親的法則。

sentences.english: In another word, Jesus got the abandon that we deserved.
sentences.chinese: 也就是說，耶穌承擔了我們當得的離棄。

sentences.english: 12And if she divorces her husband and marries another man, she commits adultery.
sentences.chinese: 妻子若離棄丈夫另嫁，也是犯奸淫了。

sentences.english: He forsook the Lord , the God of his fathers, and did not walk in the way of the Lord .
sentences.chinese: 離棄耶和華他列祖的神，不遵行耶和華的道。

sentences.english: The sailors abandoned the burning ship.
sentences.chinese: 海員們離棄燃燒着的船隻。

sentences.english: And he that passeth over from justice to sin, God hath prepared such an one for the sword.
sentences.chinese: 離棄正義而偏向罪惡的人，上主爲他準備了刀劍。

sentences.english: Because every one of us inherited Adam and Eve's inclination toward independence from God.
sentences.chinese: 由於我們每個人都繼續了亞當夏娃離棄神的偏向。

sentences.english: Don't let evil thoughts or doubts make any of you turn from the living God.
sentences.chinese: 不要讓邪惡的意念和疑心，使你們離棄了永活的上帝。

sentences.english: And they forsook the LORD, and served Baal and Ashtaroth.
sentences.chinese: 他們離棄了耶和華，去事奉巴力和亞斯他錄。

sentences.english: For the LORD will not cast off his people, neither will he forsake his inheritance.
sentences.chinese: 因爲耶和華必不丟棄他的百姓，也不離棄他的產業。

sentences.english: You have abandoned the Lord 's commands and have followed the Baals.
sentences.chinese: 因爲你們離棄耶和華的誡命，去隨從巴力。

sentences.english: They almost wiped me from the earth, but I have not forsaken your precepts.
sentences.chinese: 他們幾乎把我從世上滅絕，但我沒有離棄你的訓詞。

sentences.english: They had almost consumed me upon earth; but I forsook not thy precepts.
sentences.chinese: 他們幾乎把我從世上滅絕，但我沒有離棄你的訓詞。

sentences.english: Yet, if fellow-men desert us, will He hearken from His Throne?
sentences.chinese: 同胞把我們離棄，祂高踞寶座可否聽到？

sentences.english: While leaving the commandment of God, you hold the tradition of men.
sentences.chinese: 你們是離棄神的誡命，拘守人的傳統。

definition: to write off at one stroke
